Container.Name: clamav-daemon
Container.Overview:
Template for the docker-clamav image by mkdockx.
Dockerized open source antivirus daemons for use with file sharing containers like Nextcloud or to use it via a REST proxy like @solita made clamav-rest or to directly connect to clamav via TCP port 3310 ClamAV daemon as a Docker image. It builds with a current virus database and runs freshclam in the background constantly updating the virus signature database. clamd itself is listening on exposed port 3310.
See https://forums.unraid.net/topic/48383-support-linuxserverio-nextcloud/?do=findComment&comment=734028 for more information on how to run it with Nextcloud.
